FuncDef: The display license state trial command displays the remaining valid keepalive period of the license file.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the status of a license file in the keepalive period.
-

Examples: Info: Current license state is Trial. The trial days remains 59 days.The license for the current configuration will expire at 02:00 on the next day of the last trial day.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a license file has been activated and in the keepalive period, the display license state trial command can be run to display the remaining valid keepalive period of the license file.
Prerequisites
An active license file exists on the device.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
